TopicTitle: Selected target does not seem to work

Articles.Content:
It seems like the latest version of 1.1.2, and the latest version of MechJeb just can't seem to get along.  I lobbed up two spacecraft, got them to orbit all nice and dandy, but when I select spacecraft 'B' for the rendevous command in MechJeb, it does not register at ll in Mechjeb, even though Spaceship 'B' is selected (I can unselect, and then select again, to no avail).  Brand new games or saved games both act the same way.

Also, if I try to do any other commands in MechJeb that requires a selected target (ship), nothing works.

Sigh, 1.1.2 seems to have borked my KSP playtime for now.


Cheers,

Gaultesian.
I have this same issue. I am running Mechjeb 2.5.7

I guess we will have to wait for a MechJeb update (currently stated as 1.1.1 version, but the dev page has no new updates for 1.1.2 for now).


However, until that time, I would like to know if others have had the same issue?
